short_summary: Rental of Fences and Privacy Screens for various events on an as-and-when-required basis
description: The objective of the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO...) is to establish up to two (2) Standing Offers
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Rental of Fences and Privacy Screens**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01010472
**Solicitation Number:** 10212919
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-19
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-28T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2022-11-25
**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

## Service Details

The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) is seeking up to two (2) Standing Offers from contractors to supply construction-grade fences and privacy screens for various events in the National Capital Region (NCR). The contract will be effective from April 1, 2023, to October 31, 2024, with an option to extend for three (3) additional years.

## Mandatory Evaluation Criteria

Bidders must demonstrate their experience in providing similar services by submitting a minimum of three (3) similar projects completed within the last twelve (12) years prior to the closing date of this RFSO. Each project description must include:

* Client's name, phone, and email
* Description of the work
* Details of the materials and equipment used
* Location of the project
* Dates the work was performed

## Security Requirement

There is no security requirement for this contract unless work on the Parliament Hill is necessary. In such cases, the contractor must comply with the Security Requirements Checklist and Security Directive (if applicable) attached as Annex "F".

## Contracting Details

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest priced responsive bidder. The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact:

Lise Berniquez
contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca

Please refer to the following attachments for more information:
